text:
Xiaomi introduced Mi Watch, and this is the most insolent copy of Apple Watch
05 Nov 2019, 12:25 by Ilya Sidorov
Xiaomi introduced its first Mi Watch smartwatch.
Prior to this, the company produced only fitness bracelets, while other partners created Xiaomi smart watches.
The manufacturer and users have high hopes for a new gadget, since Xiaomi often makes good accessories at low prices.
Design like Apple Watch



Xiaomi did not think much about the design, so it just copied the Apple Watch. From a distance, it will be difficult to distinguish the Mi Watch from the Apple Watch, but a direct comparison shows that Xiaomi has sharper edges of the case.
Mi Watch is sold in a single version with a 1.78-inch screen. He has 326 PPI, which means the image will be clear.
On the right there is a crown that is used to navigate the interface. Just below the multi-function button.
The body of the device is made of aluminum. A little later a steel version will appear.
Top features



Mi Watch was the first to receive the Snapdragon Wear 3100 4G processor. The watch supports eSIM.
Xiaomi has installed a 570 mAh battery. For comparison, the Apple Watch Series 5 44 mm uses a battery with a capacity of 296 mAh. The manufacturer claims that the Mi Watch lasts two days without recharging.
In addition, the watch has Wi-Fi (n), Bluetooth 4.2, GPS and NFC.
Run on Wear OS, unexpectedly



As an operating system, Xiaomi decided to use Wear OS, but with a MIUI shell. The company has developed many dials, and also introduced its own voice assistant XiaoAi.
Mi Watch can be used to track your workouts, heart rate and sleep. They also have a sensor that detects the oxygen content in the blood.


Applications that run on Mi Watch.

The watch has its own Xiaomi app store. At the start, more than 40 applications are optimized for them. These are mainly Chinese programs.
Price and start of sales



Mi Watch will go on sale on November 11 at a price of 1299 yuan or 11,700 rubles.
Attention. The lineup also has an ‚Äúexclusive Mi Watch‚Äù (no joke). Sapphire crystal screen, case and stainless steel strap. This top version will appear in December and will cost 1999 yuan or 18,000 rubles. [Gizmochina]
